meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed and unsure if I can keep up in my history course
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Robert and I'm a fourth-year History major. This is the final semester of my major, and I’m really feeling the pressure to do well. Last year, I took a lot of history classes and ended up with a 3.5 GPA, but this semester I’m taking more advanced courses and I’m worried I won’t be able to keep up. I’m also involved in a few academic clubs and am trying to balance my studies with extracurriculars and internships. I feel like I’m falling behind, but I don’t know if I’m even doing the right things. I’m hoping to talk with someone who can help me manage my academic load and work on improving my skills in history.
